translation.en: ♪ I'm no slobby boy ♪ ♪ I never beg for no money ♪ ♪ Fun, fun, funny You'll run from me ♪ ♪ No irony, no ♪
translation.zh: （意大利塞纳莱斯阿尔卑斯滑雪度假村）

translation.en: [woman] Almost there. Just pulling the encryption key.
translation.zh: 差不多了 正在获取加密密钥

translation.en: Four hours in the van, and she's eaten all the crisps.
translation.zh: 在车里待了四小时她把薯片都吃光了

translation.en: She's stuck in there with you, so that's comfort eating.
translation.zh: 她跟你一起被困在车上 只能借吃消愁

translation.en: Been boring her with your cat chat again?
translation.zh: 你又聊猫 让她觉得无趣了？

translation.en: Cat chat? Actually, Parker, she likes my Barry the Cat stories.
translation.zh: “聊猫”？ 事实上 帕克她喜欢听我讲巴里猫的故事

translation.en: You like my Barry the Cat stories, right?
translation.zh: 你喜欢听我讲巴里猫的故事 对吧？

translation.en: Before you know it, you're gonna want one of your own.
translation.zh: 嘿 你不知不觉就想自己当铲屎官了

translation.en: [inhales sharply] Cats hate me. Sorry, Bailey.
translation.zh: 猫视我为敌 抱歉 贝利
我在编写新的访问代码

translation.en: I have eyes on Mulvaney. Intel was good.
translation.zh: 我看到穆菲尼了 情报准确

translation.en: Europe's most wanted arms dealer seen for the first time in three years.
translation.zh: 欧洲头号军火通缉犯 三年来首度现身

translation.en: Adding names and faces to the guest list.
translation.zh: 我把姓名和照片添加到宾客名单上

translation.en: -How long do you need? -[Stone] Nearly there.
Hang on. Something's changed. I can't connect.
translation.zh: 等等 有状况 我连不上网络

translation.en: We need a new plan to get you in.
translation.zh: 我们需要另想办法 让你们混进去

translation.en: I need direct access to someone who's already on the network.
translation.zh: 我需要直接连已接通网络的人

translation.en: Head of security. He's at the bar.
translation.zh: 保安主管 他在酒吧

translation.en: [Stone] I could hack his phone, but I'll need to be close to him.
translation.zh: 我可以黑进他的手机但我得靠近他才行

translation.en: [Parker] Stone, you're not a field agent. Do not get out of the van.
translation.zh: 斯通 你不是外勤探员 别下车

translation.en: Our arms dealer's on the move right now, and I do not wanna lose him.
translation.zh: 这位军火商正在行动中 我不想把他跟丢了

translation.en: [Bailey] There's no other way. We have to get Mulvaney.
translation.zh: 别无他法 我们必须逮住穆菲尼
你需要什么 告诉我

translation.en: When I'm within ten feet of the head of security, call his phone.
translation.zh: 我进入保安主管三米范围内时 打他的手机

translation.en: [Parker] I can't tail them any further.
translation.zh: 我没法继续跟踪他们了

translation.en: [woman] Stone, listen to me. Waiter to your right.
translation.zh: 斯通 听我说 你右侧有个服务生
-谢谢-很好 现在把香槟喝了

translation.en: [Parker] He's headed towards the blackjack table.
Do you know how to play?
I was on the chess team.
translation.zh: 我以前是国际象棋队的
要换吗 先生？没问题 100？

translation.en: [dealer] One hundred, sir, in change. Okay. Everybody ready?
translation.zh: 先生 100块的零钱 好 各位都准备好了吗？

translation.en: Maybe I should quit while I'm ahead.
Not bad for your first time out of the van.
translation.zh: 第一次外勤任务表现不错

translation.en: I think I just lost two years off my life.
translation.zh: 刚才让我紧张得折寿了两年
-搞定了吗？-是的 我连上网了

translation.en: Okay. Got him. Through the kitchen, down the stairs.
translation.zh: 好 找到他了 穿过厨房 下楼
把你们加入到人脸识别系统

translation.en: I'm almost afraid to see what drew Mulvaney out of his hole.
translation.zh: 真不知道是什么让穆菲尼重现江湖我有点担心

translation.en: [announcer] We're now taking bets for the next game,
translation.zh: 现在为下一场赌局下注

translation.en: which will begin in two minutes.
[woman] You were right about Mulvaney's gambling habit.
translation.zh: 你说穆菲尼好赌 果真如此

translation.en: He never met a bet he didn't place.
[announcer] You must predict the exact order of kills.
translation.zh: 玩家必须准确预测杀戮的顺序

translation.en: [soldier] Copy, Delta Kilo Six. We have reported hostiles…
translation.zh: 收到 DK6 我们已报告有敌人…

translation.en: [announcer] With a bet of four instant kills,
this is a win for player number 46.
translation.zh: 这一局的赢家是46号玩家

translation.en: Just a bit to your right.
That's US Navy Seals in real-time.
translation.zh: 那是美国海豹突击队的实时画面
他们破解了军事级加密系统

translation.en: Okay, Dr. Yang. You have the floor.
translation.zh: 好了 杨医生 接下来看你大显身手

translation.en: Time to give Mulvaney his heart attack.
translation.zh: 是时候让穆菲尼心脏病发作了

translation.en: [Yang] I'll handle this guy. You take Mulvaney.
translation.zh: 我来对付这家伙 你去抓穆菲尼

translation.en: Mulvaney's on your right. Another service corridor.
translation.zh: 穆菲尼在你右侧 另一个员工通道
做好准备 我这就切断电源

translation.en: I've got Mulvaney. Bailey, get us out of here. Fast.
translation.zh: 我抓到穆菲尼了 贝利 马上带我们离开这里

translation.en: You guys really need to work on your subtlety.
I should've listened to the voices in my head.
translation.zh: 我真该听从自己的直觉

translation.en: "The British are coming. The British are coming."
Exfil route Bravo. We have to go dark.
translation.zh: 备选撤退路线 我们要切断通讯

translation.en: Copy that. See you down there.

translation.zh: 有更多穆菲尼的人来了

translation.en: They're heading to the cable car station. Parker's a sitting duck.
translation.zh: 他们正朝缆车站方向过去 帕克有危险

translation.en: We need to get down there now.

translation.zh: -斯通！-快走 别管我 我没事
待着别动 我们马上回来

translation.en: Jack, this is Nine of Hearts. Urgent forecast required.
translation.zh: 杰克 我是红心九 请提供紧急预测

translation.en: Nine, we have your position and the full overview.
translation.zh: 九号 已获取你的位置和整体概况

translation.en: The MI6 team won't get down the mountain in time.
translation.zh: 军情六处小组无法及时下山

translation.en: The Heart gives a 93 percent chance that Parker will die
translation.zh: 据谍心预测 除非特许局干预

translation.en: and Mulvaney will get away unless the Charter intervenes.
translation.zh: 帕克有93%的几率会死 穆菲尼会逃脱

translation.en: Fifty meters away, over the handrail to your right.
The Heart has a chance of success at just 32 percent.
Um… Stone, big drop coming up.
translation.zh: 斯通 前方有落差很大的悬崖

translation.en: Eight minutes out. We're not gonna make it.
translation.zh: 还需八分钟 没法及时赶到

translation.en: Stone, Mulvaney's security are arriving at the cable car station.
translation.zh: 斯通 穆菲尼的保安队抵达缆车站了

translation.en: Take the route to your left. You need to pick up the pace.
translation.zh: 走左侧的路线 你得加快速度

translation.en: The terrain's too flat, and you're losing altitude.
translation.zh: 地势太平 海拔不够高

translation.en: If you cut across to the piste, you can pick up a snow bike.
translation.zh: 如果抄近路到滑雪道 可以弄到一辆雪地摩托
那是因为你缺乏想象力

translation.en: He can hold them off without us, right?
translation.zh: 没有我们 他也能应敌 对吧？

translation.en: [Jack] You can get ahead of the bikes at the next corner.
translation.zh: 下个弯道就可以赶超那些雪地摩托

translation.en: Stone, watch Bailey and Yang to your right.
translation.zh: 斯通 小心你右侧的贝利和小杨

translation.en: The Charter's worked too hard to embed you in MI6.
translation.zh: 特许局费了很大劲才把你安插进军情六处
我们不能冒险暴露你的身份

translation.en: How many in the welcome party?
Four pistols, one shotgun, and a sniper
translation.zh: 四个用手枪 一个用霰弹枪还有一个狙击手
他的狙杀记录令人侧目

translation.en: [Jack] Get away from them. Take the path to your right.
translation.zh: 离他们远点 走右侧那条道路

translation.en: The sniper has opened fire on Parker.

translation.zh: 杰克 告诉我怎么做

translation.en: Uh… two more on your right.
Parker and target still very much alive.
translation.zh: 帕克和目标还活得好好的

translation.en: Now, hide the bodies and get out before MI6 sees you.
translation.zh: 把尸体藏起来 赶紧离开免得军情六处的人发现你

translation.en: Mulvaney had an army of security.
[Parker] Got scared off by the sirens maybe?
No point waiting to find out. Let's just grab him and go.
translation.zh: 事不宜迟 把他带走就行

translation.en: Grab a leg. We have to get back up the mountain for Stone.
translation.zh: 抓住一条腿 我们得返回山上去接斯通
好了 天才 现在怎么办？

translation.en: ♪ For myself 'Cause I've been quiet way too long ♪
♪ Believe me, all I want is you ♪
The Italians are livid, as are Defense and Number 10.
translation.zh: 意大利方面勃然大怒 国防部和首相府也震怒

translation.en: -I take full responsibility. -[man] "I." That's your problem, Parker.
translation.zh: 我负全责 你的问题就是满嘴只有“我” 帕克

translation.en: Yang gave the wrong person a heart attack.
translation.zh: 小杨搞错对象让另一个人心脏病发作

translation.en: And Stone, what the hell were you thinking getting out of the van?
translation.zh: 还有斯通 你到底想些什么？居然下车？

translation.en: -That was the only way she could get-- -[man] Put it in the report.
translation.zh: -只有那样 她才能…-写进报告吧

translation.en: Paperwork. Excellent. That'll show Mulvaney's lads who's boss.
translation.zh: 文书工作 好极了 那会让穆菲尼的人明白谁才是老大

translation.en: Mulvaney's gone. And so is any hope of using him as an asset.
translation.zh: 穆菲尼已死 将他纳为己用的希望也破灭了

translation.en: But now we have a new target.
translation.zh: 不过现在我们有了新的目标

translation.en: Someone broke through the highest levels of military encryption, including our own.
translation.zh: 有人闯入最高级别的军事级加密系统 包括我们的加密系统

translation.en: -Did you look into the girl? -[man] The girl?
Oh, yes. I'm afraid we'll need more than that.
translation.zh: 查过 恐怕我们需要做更多

translation.en: We are trying to trace her, but so far, we have nothing.
translation.zh: 我们正在想办法追踪她但目前一无所获

translation.en: -I'm happy to look-- -[man] We have people for that.
translation.zh: -我很乐意去查…-我们有人做这种事

translation.en: You can all concentrate on your admin. Sandra.
translation.zh: 你们专心写报告吧 珊卓

translation.en: -First time out of the van. -[all] Hey!
-[Bailey] And she didn't blow the op-- -[Yang] No, we did that all on our own.
translation.zh: 她没搞砸行动 所以… 对 是我们自己搞砸的

translation.en: Too bad. Been on a good winning streak since Stone joined us.
translation.zh: 真可惜 自从斯通加入以来我们一直连战连胜

translation.en: Thought you might be our lucky charm. But you did win at blackjack.
translation.zh: 还以为你或许是我们的福星呢 不过你确实赢了21点

translation.en: And I'm never gambling again or stepping out of the van.
translation.zh: 我戒赌了 也不会再出外勤

translation.en: What'd you do when I left you up there?
translation.zh: 我们离开后 你做了什么？

translation.en: -What? You said to stay out of sight. -True.
translation.zh: -怎么？你们说不要被人发现-没错

translation.en: We got more important things to discuss.
translation.zh: 我们有更重要的事要讨论

translation.en: But let's be honest. We already know who she works for.
translation.zh: 说真的 我们已经知道她为谁效力

translation.en: Whatever. I just identified another one of their ops.
translation.zh: 无所谓了 我刚确认了他们的另一项行动

translation.en: They took out a terror cell who hijacked an oil tanker in the Panama Canal.
translation.zh: 他们干掉了一个恐怖小组 该小组在巴拿马运河劫持了一艘油轮

translation.en: Yeah, but who would have that kind of power?
translation.zh: 是啊 但谁有那种能耐？
-我又说这种话了 对吗？-对
好吧 好 尽管笑我

translation.en: Ex-intelligence operatives answering only to themselves.
translation.zh: 只听命于自己的前情报人员

translation.en: No national allegiances, no political leanings.
translation.zh: 不效忠任何国家 没有任何政治倾向

translation.en: Putting out fires their governments never allowed them to. That's…
translation.zh: 摆平政府不允许他们插手的问题

translation.en: working together to keep peace in a turbulent world.
translation.zh: 在动荡的世界中 携手维护和平

translation.en: No. That is a Saturday morning cartoon.
translation.zh: 不 这是子虚乌有的事

translation.en: Nobody knows about the Charter because they don't exist.
translation.zh: 没人了解特许局 因为他们不存在

translation.en: This girl is part of it, and you know it.
translation.zh: 这女孩就是特许局的 你们心知肚明

translation.en: Okay, don't judge me. I'm gonna go with this for a sec.
translation.zh: 好 别对我妄加评论我就顺着你们的话说几句
如果特许局喜欢帮倒忙
那女孩为何要打断我们的行动？

translation.en: Sorry, Bailey, there is no secret genius organization pulling all the strings.
translation.zh: 不好意思 贝利 没有什么隐秘的天才组织在幕后操纵一切

translation.en: It's just us, Sandra, and her paperwork.
translation.zh: 只是我们、珊卓和她的文书工作

translation.en: But it was a nice bedtime story. Speaking of which…
translation.zh: 不过这个睡前故事不错 说到这点…

translation.en: -Jet lag. -Um, there's a one-hour time difference.
translation.zh: 倒时差 时差只有一小时

translation.en: -I drive with that eye. -Might make you a better driver.
translation.zh: -我用这只眼睛开车-没准能让你车技更好
-开玩笑 我收回我的话-不

translation.en: A field agent should be ready for anything.
translation.zh: 外勤探员应随时准备应对任何情况

translation.en: You were saying? I never should have told you I swim.
translation.zh: 你说什么？ 真不该告诉你我会游泳

translation.en: No news. We were told not to look.
translation.zh: 没有消息 上面交代过不要查

translation.en: Look, if we leave it to the pen-pushers at MI6,
translation.zh: 听着 如果这事交给军情六处的文员

translation.en: she'll hack the entire world before we even get a name.
translation.zh: 在我们查到名字之前 她会骇遍全球

translation.en: I should've gone beyond the mission and brought her in.
translation.zh: 我应该主动一点 把她抓过来的

translation.en: Well, your hands were pretty full at the time.
And besides, it wasn't our objective.
translation.zh: 再说 我们的目标又不是抓她

translation.en: Why don't you try and live a little? Could be fun.
translation.zh: 尝试做点出格的事吧 可能会很好玩哦

translation.en: What happened to "Don't get out of the van, Rachel"? Ah.
So, rules are rules unless they apply to you.
translation.zh: 所以你无视规定时 就可以变通

translation.en: Why do I feel like you know me better than I know you?
translation.zh: 看来你更了解我 而我不怎么了解你

translation.en: Maybe I should listen to one of these dreary podcasts of yours.
translation.zh: 或许我该听听你那些无聊的播客

translation.en: Mock our music, and I won't tell you my theory.
translation.zh: 你再笑我们的音乐我就不说自己的看法了

translation.en: She's new to the scene. Has to be.
Otherwise, we would have heard about her.
translation.zh: 否则我们会对她有所耳闻

translation.en: To get a guest list like that--
translation.zh: 要搞到那样一份宾客名单…

translation.en: She's working with someone else. A veteran. But who?
translation.zh: 她跟一名老手合作 不过是谁呢？

translation.en: We'll make a list. I'll bring snacks.
translation.zh: 我们列个名单出来 我会带零食过来

translation.en: I, uh, I'm sorry. I already have… a brunch date.
translation.zh: 抱歉 我已经跟人约了去吃早午餐

translation.en: Nine of Hearts, it's good to see you.
translation.zh: 红心九 很高兴见到你

translation.en: -How's it going? -It's been busy. This way.
The Charter has been dealing with three actionable threats this morning.
translation.zh: 特许局今早一直在处理三起具有可行性的威胁

translation.en: Potential sarin gas attack in Paris.
translation.zh: 巴黎可能会发生沙林毒气袭击

translation.en: The Heart predicted the time and location of the attack with 87% certainty.
translation.zh: 谍心预测了攻击时间和地点有87%的把握

translation.en: Eight of Hearts is on site now.
Six is defusing a potential international incident

translation.zh: 化解一起潜在的国际事件

translation.en: And Diamonds team's handling hackers targeting the North American power grid.
translation.zh: 方块队正在对付攻击北美电网的黑客

translation.en: -[peafowl caws] -[Stone] Hey, Jack. Enjoying your new office?
translation.zh: 嘿 杰克 喜欢你的新办公室吗？

translation.en: We can't all be gallivanting around the Alps.
translation.zh: 我们不可能都在阿尔卑斯山闲逛

translation.en: How's King of Hearts? Is she angry?
translation.zh: 红心国王怎么样了？ 她生气了？

translation.en: Well, let's see. You lost control of the situation, target is dead,
translation.zh: 我们来看看 场面失控 目标死亡 然后你不得不干掉六个人

translation.en: then you had to kill six men.
translation.zh: 目标死亡 然后你不得不干掉六个人
战果辉煌真该给你颁发维多利亚十字勋章
战果辉煌真该给你颁发维多利亚十字勋章 早安 诺玛

translation.en: Good to see you too. Love what you've done with the place.
translation.zh: 我也很高兴见到你 你把这地方改造得真不错

translation.en: Is she developing a sense of humor?

translation.zh: 找到那女孩了？ 当然

translation.en: She is from Pune in the west of India.
translation.zh: 她是印度西部浦那的人
制药业的亿万富翁投资人

translation.en: Ran IT workshops for kids in underprivileged communities.
translation.zh: 为贫困社区的儿童开设IT学习营

translation.en: [Stone] He spotted her in one of these programs.
translation.zh: 他在其中一个项目中发现了她

translation.en: Yeah. He saw she was a prodigy, took her under his wing, trained her up,
translation.zh: 对 他慧眼识珠 把她纳入麾下 训练她

translation.en: and then they had a falling out.
[Nomad] The Heart's better at whats than whys.
translation.zh: 谍心擅长分析事实 分析原因是弱项

translation.en: And the what is, she split from Kharche and disappeared.
translation.zh: 事实是 她与卡奇分道扬镳后就人间蒸发了

translation.en: Not much older than when we met.
translation.zh: 我认识你时 也差不多是这个年纪

translation.en: [Nomad] Yes, but she fell in with a bunch of criminal lowlifes.
translation.zh: 对 但她与不法之徒为伍

translation.en: Some people get all the luck.
We think that Keya set up the casino of blood.
translation.zh: 我们认为凯娅开设了血腥赌场

translation.en: She knew about Mulvaney's gambling habit and used it to lure him in.
translation.zh: 她深知穆菲尼有赌瘾 以此引他上钩

translation.en: Mulvaney had become obsessed with a new weapon, a myth.
translation.zh: 穆菲尼迷上了一件谜一般的新武器

translation.en: A quantum computer sophisticated enough to hack into anything, anywhere.
translation.zh: 一台尖端量子计算机 可以入侵任何地方的任何东西

translation.en: that Keya is heading to Lisbon for the opening of Club Moritz.
translation.zh: 预测凯娅要去里斯本 参加莫里茨俱乐部的开业典礼

translation.en: So, we will leak her location to MI6.
translation.zh: 我们会把她的位置透露给军情六处

translation.en: Then we should have your operation back up and running within 24 hours.
translation.zh: 然后24小时内 你们的行动就能重新启动

translation.en: Keya chose to hack into our comms feed on the mountain.
translation.zh: 凯娅选择骇入我们在山上的通讯信号

translation.en: She revealed herself to me, looked me straight in the eye.
translation.zh: 她主动跟我打招呼 直视我的眼睛

translation.en: I'm not sure if we should ignore the Heart,
translation.zh: 谍心是人类所拥有最接近完美智能的系统

translation.en: the closest mankind has to perfect intelligence,
translation.zh: 我不确定就因为她在酒吧里看了你一眼

translation.en: because of eye contact in a bar.
translation.zh: 我们就该无视谍心的预测结果

translation.en: This might be why you're single, Jack.
translation.zh: 难怪你会单身 杰克

translation.en: Just not with your MI6 team.
translation.zh: 别跟你军情六处的队友吃就行

translation.en: So, you're spying on me now.
translation.zh: 这么说你现在在监视我

translation.en: You know what you signed up for.
translation.zh: 你清楚干这份活的条件
不准谈恋爱 不准交朋友
不准在泳池边跟人私聊

translation.en: What we do is too important.
When governments fail, the only thing left is the Charter.
translation.zh: 政府失能时 就只能靠特许局了

translation.en: I'm undercover. This is just part of it.
translation.zh: 我是卧底 这是职责所在

translation.en: Come on, Keya. Take the bait.
translation.zh: 来吧 凯娅 上钩吧

translation.en: [Bailey] Hey. We got a lead on hacker girl.
translation.zh: 嘿 那个黑客女孩有线索了

translation.en: Oh no, no. Barry's all right. He's--
translation.zh: 不用 巴里没事 它…
我告诉它了 不准开派对

translation.en: [Parker] Ah Jesus. Just when we thought it couldn't get worse.
translation.zh: 老天 我们还以为情况不会变得更糟

translation.en: -[Bailey] Are you singing? -[Parker] I'm clearing my throat.
translation.zh: -你在唱歌吗？帕克 你在唱歌吗？-没有 只是清嗓子

translation.en: ♪ I want to be with you everywhere ♪ ♪ Oh, I ♪
Bailey, you should meet my gran. She has the same taste in music,
translation.zh: 你该认识一下我奶奶 她的音乐品位跟你一样

translation.en: and you have the same hair.

translation.zh: 这是我的车 放什么歌我说了算
不好意思 哇 下次再猛一点

translation.en: Little harder next time. I didn't quite crack a tooth.
translation.zh: 哇 下次再猛一点 我的牙没被磕掉

translation.en: Yeah, I'm fine. I'm just, uh…
translation.zh: 嗯 没事 我只是…

translation.en: Come on, swap seats with me.
translation.zh: 来吧 跟我换下座位

translation.en: -What? No, no, no. It's fine. -Come on. No, it's fine. Move.
translation.zh: 什么？不用 没事 来吧 不 没事 让开

translation.en: [Parker] Aren't you supposed to be an elite driver?
translation.zh: 你的车技不是应该很好吗？

translation.en: [Yang] How long till the club opens?
translation.zh: 俱乐部还要多久才开张？

translation.en: [Bailey] We head out in a couple of hours.
Sent you something. Check it out.
translation.zh: 给你发了个东西 看看吧

translation.en: -What is this? -It's for my niece's birthday.
translation.zh: -这是什么？-给我侄女的生日礼物

translation.en: What do you think? Female perspective?

translation.zh: 帕克 这音乐过时了

translation.en: -What are you, a hundred years old? -It's called culture.
translation.zh: 你是山顶洞人吗？ 这叫文艺范

translation.en: Yeah. Sorry, Parker, I'm with Yang. Yang!
translation.zh: 嗯 抱歉 帕克我跟小杨一个观点 小杨！

translation.en: Oh, come on, Bailey. You know you want to.
translation.zh: 来啊 贝利 来嘛 别多想

translation.en: [Bailey] You know you want to. Come on.
translation.zh: 来嘛 别多想 来吧

translation.en: Watch out, you might actually enjoy yourself.
translation.zh: 小心 你说不定会很开心

translation.en: Six hostiles moving up the stairs. More outside.
translation.zh: 六名敌人正在上楼 外面有更多

translation.en: They'll breach the doorway in four…
translation.zh: 他们即将破门而入 四…
杰克 我需要你帮忙

translation.en: Come on. Parker, come on. Come on!
translation.zh: 快 帕克 快醒醒

translation.en: Saving them is not your mission.
No. At best, you break cover. Most likely, you die.
translation.zh: 不行 你重则没命 轻则暴露身份
还会有更多敌人 快点

translation.en: Yeah, yeah. It works. Just not on every car.
translation.zh: 对 管用 但不是对每辆车都管用

translation.en: -Away from the guns, Stone. Away! -Just a second.
translation.zh: 避开枪 斯通 避开！ 稍等

translation.en: Okay, Stone. Time to start talking.
translation.zh: 好了 斯通 老实交代

translation.en: You hack, you fight, and you drive. Parker, are you getting this?
translation.zh: 你会黑客技术、身手不凡、车技了得帕克 你懂吗？

translation.en: -Three vehicles. Lots of guns. -Yeah, I can tell by the bullets.
translation.zh: -三辆车 很多枪-嗯 子弹满天飞 看得出来

translation.en: -Stone! -Sort of in the middle of something.
Oh, okay. Okay, you got it.
-Are you trying to kill us? -Pretty much the opposite, actually.
translation.zh: 你想让我们没命吗？ 恰恰相反

translation.en: Okay. This might be kind of intense.
translation.zh: 好了 这下可能会有点猛
-斯通 敌人还是穷追不舍-我知道

translation.en: Well, I can't speak for the others, but I… I think you're ready for the field.
translation.zh: 我不能代表其他人发言 但我觉得你可以出外勤了

translation.en: We need to get off the road and lose this van.
translation.zh: 我们得驶离公路 把这辆车丢掉

translation.en: a baby agent from IT just took out an entire kill team.
translation.zh: 一名IT部门的菜鸟探员干掉了一整支杀戮小队
-拜托 贝利 你怎么一直蒙在鼓里？-该死

translation.en: The Charter? You're the… you're the bloody Charter?
translation.zh: 特许局？你是特许局的人？

translation.en: What, are you trying to bring in Dhawan yourself?
translation.zh: 怎么？你打算自己去抓达万吗？

translation.en: I wish I could've told you more.
translation.zh: 听着 我没法透露太多

translation.en: But we all want the same thing.
You're not the only one with a secret.
translation.zh: 你不是唯一有秘密的人

translation.en: Did they mean something to you?
Oh, come on, Rachel. You're only playing a part, right?
translation.zh: 别这样 瑞秋 你只是在演戏 对吗？

translation.en: Why don't you ask the Heart?
If you wanted me dead, you would have shot me first.
translation.zh: 如果你想要我的命 会最先冲我开枪

translation.en: [exhales] Still a few things I need to know.

translation.zh: 关于你 关于特许局

translation.en: I was looking forward to a fight.
Keya and I learned that the Charter infiltrated MI6.
translation.zh: 凯娅和我得知有特许局的人打入军情六处

translation.en: I had to flush out who.
At first, I thought it was Yang,
but I was so pleased it was you.
A little basic, I know, but it hits the spot.
translation.zh: 我知道只是雕虫小技 不过很管用

translation.en: Looks like the paralysis is kicking in.
translation.zh: 看来麻醉剂开始起作用了

translation.en: I spent six years looking for you people, Stone.
translation.zh: 斯通 我花了六年的时间找你们

translation.en: Then fate brings you straight to me.
translation.zh: 然后命运把你直接带到我面前

translation.en: But you were so busy letting a machine think for you that you missed me.
translation.zh: 但你忙着让机器替你思考 以致于没注意到我

translation.en: Well, he was tech-averse like me.
So, Keya and I set up our casino of blood to lure him in.
translation.zh: 于是我和凯娅设下血腥赌场引他入局

translation.en: We needed to have a little chat about the Heart.
translation.zh: 我们需要谈谈谍心的事

translation.en: The Heart is what gives the Charter its power.
translation.zh: 特许局的神通广大都是因为谍心

translation.en: It's the most formidable weapon you never knew existed.
translation.zh: 它是最令人生畏的武器人们从来不知道它的存在

translation.en: It can hack into anything, anywhere.
translation.zh: 它可以入侵任何地方的任何东西

translation.en: Cell phones, power grids, the banks, governments, military, health records.
translation.zh: 手机、电网、银行政府、军方、健康档案

translation.en: It knows you better than you know yourself.
With access to trillions of data points at once, its modeling is so accurate
translation.zh: 它可以同时访问数万亿个数据点 模拟精准

translation.en: The Heart is knowledge and power.
It can crash a market or drop a plane out of the sky.
translation.zh: 它可以让市场崩溃 也可以引发坠机

translation.en: Who needs to steal a nuclear bomb when you can control them all?
translation.zh: 如果能控制所有核弹 谁还需要偷呢？

translation.en: Only a Charter member could tell you.
translation.zh: 只有特许局的成员知道
毒药是胆碱酯酶抑制剂

translation.en: My chemist does all the classics.
translation.zh: 我的药剂师会调配各种经典毒药

translation.en: Killing you is not part of the plan. We need you to deliver a package first.
translation.zh: 我可不想杀你 我们需要你先去送个包裹
很高兴跟你共事 瑞秋

translation.en: [nurse panting] Hold her here. Hold her down.
-[grunting] -Take this. Help me. Help me here.
translation.zh: 拿着 帮帮我 帮我一把

translation.en: Wait. Get me atropine. Five mils.
translation.zh: 等等 给我五毫升阿托品

translation.en: It's… There's a Trojan in our system delivered wirelessly.
translation.zh: 我们的系统里有个无线发送的木马病毒

translation.en: Chewing through security like it isn't there.
translation.zh: 它在肆无忌惮地攻击我们的安全系统

translation.en: Nomad, I've tried. No-go. They're trying to access the Heart.
translation.zh: 诺玛 我试过了 不行他们试图访问谍心
从哪里来的？我们有防火墙

translation.en: It's a weak wireless signal. It's coming from…
translation.zh: 是个微弱的无线信号 来自…

translation.en: [doctor] Quickly. We need to monitor her airway.
translation.zh: 快点 我们需要监视她的气管

translation.en: What's happened? I need to know what's happened.
translation.zh: 怎么了？我要知道发生了什么事

translation.en: [Jack] Three minutes and 45 seconds. Running a system check now.
translation.zh: 3分45秒 正在运行系统检查

translation.en: We need to know what they accessed. Is the Locker safe?
translation.zh: 我们得知道他们访问了哪些资料谍柜安全吗？

translation.en: The Locker is still flying high
with the Heart safe inside, 85,000 feet up.
translation.zh: 离地面26千米谍心在里面安全无虞

translation.en: No one's getting up there without a space shuttle.
translation.zh: 没有飞船 没人能上去

translation.en: It's passing over the Atlantic, towards West Africa.
translation.zh: 它正飞越大西洋 向西非进发

translation.en: And the other suits, can they still access the Heart?
translation.zh: 其他团队还能访问谍心吗？
看来可以 老天 怎么？

translation.en: There've been 100,000 attempts to access files.
translation.zh: 尝试访问文件的次数已达十万次

translation.en: Clubs team are analyzing the data, but looks like our security held.
translation.zh: 梅花队正在分析数据不过看来我们的安全措施没被攻破

translation.en: We need to shut it all down now.
translation.zh: 我们必须马上把它关闭

translation.en: -Shut what down? The Heart? -Until we know what they've done.
translation.zh: 关闭什么？谍心？ 我们得先知道他们做了什么

translation.en: We have no idea what they're capable of.
translation.zh: 我们不知道他们有什么能耐

translation.en: Don't need to shut it down to find out what they've done.
translation.zh: 但要弄清楚他们做了什么没必要关闭谍心

translation.en: -We'd be harming ourselves. -We don't know. She's not stupid.
translation.zh: 这样对我们自己不利 这可不一定 她不傻

translation.en: -And neither are we. -Sure about that? Because right now--
translation.zh: -我们也不傻-确定吗？因为现在…

translation.en: Rachel. Rachel. He's right. We'll sort it.
translation.zh: 瑞秋 他说得对 我们会解决
我要跟你私下谈谈 马上过来

translation.en: I told you. I knew Keya was playing us, playing the Heart.
translation.zh: 我早就说了 我就知道凯娅在耍我们 在玩弄谍心

translation.en: No, you didn't. No, you didn't You had a feeling.
translation.zh: 不 你不知道 只是你的感觉
没确凿证据 也没可执行方案

translation.en: A mood, a notion, a hunch, a bollocks. We don't trade in those.
translation.zh: 情绪、观念、预感 都是胡扯这些东西我们不买账

translation.en: I knew she wouldn't be there.
You ignored the Heart, and you went back in.
translation.zh: 你无视谍心 折回去

translation.en: -To save my team. -They weren't your team.
translation.zh: -我是为了救队友-他们不是你的队友

translation.en: They died anyway. You going back made sure of that.
translation.zh: 他们还是死了你折回去 害他们必死无疑

translation.en: If you'd left when we told you to, Parker would've followed you,
translation.zh: 如果你照我们的指示离开帕克就不会追踪你

translation.en: we'd have caught him, and Yang and Bailey might be alive.
translation.zh: 我们就会抓到他小杨和贝利或许还活着

translation.en: -I should've just listened to the Heart? -Yes.
translation.zh: 那么我就该听从谍心？ 是的

translation.en: The Charter exists for one reason.
translation.zh: 特许局的存在只为一个原因

translation.en: To maximize lives saved. That's the only moral metric there is.
translation.zh: 最大限度地挽救生命这是唯一的道德标准

translation.en: And it's a calculation. A pure and objective calculation.
translation.zh: 这是计算 纯粹而客观的计算

translation.en: Made for us by a machine.
translation.zh: 让一台机器为我们计算

translation.en: Have you forgotten how radical that is?
It doesn't mean that what we do is easy or feels nice.
translation.zh: 这并不意味着我们所做之事很容易或感觉很好

translation.en: You'll have the voices of those people in your head for the rest of your life.
translation.zh: 在你的余生中 这些人的声音 都会萦绕在你脑海里

translation.en: And you will never not feel responsible for them ever.
translation.zh: 你永远会觉得自己害死了他们

translation.en: But the end justifies the means.
translation.zh: 但为达目的 不择手段

translation.en: I spent every day with Parker for a year and didn't see it coming.
translation.zh: 一年来 我跟帕克每天共处 没料到会这样

translation.en: So, what do we do now?
Gonna make some tough choices, and this is the first one.
translation.zh: 要做一些艰难的抉择 这是第一个

translation.en: Keep your head down. Don't do anything stupid.
translation.zh: 保持低调 别做傻事

translation.en: Parker knows you. Dhawan knows you.
translation.zh: 帕克知道你 达万也知道

translation.en: And the other Kings, quite rightly… don't know if you can be trusted.
translation.zh: 其他国王不知道能否信任你这也情有可原

translation.en: I want to protect what we've spent 20 years trying to build.
translation.zh: 我想保护我们花了20年打造的东西

translation.en: [Keya] So, why is a Charter agent riding around all alone,
translation.zh: 一位特许局探员在中毒数小时后
为何独自搭巴士四处游荡？

translation.en: Doesn't feel like they're taking care of their most valuable player.
translation.zh: 他们好像不在乎自己最重要的探员

translation.en: I bet you used to think we were so alike. Now you know I'm better.
translation.zh: 你以前一定觉得我俩很像 现在你知道我更胜一筹
更胜一筹？ 你杀了我的朋友

translation.en: Well, I told you this wasn't a game, Keya.
translation.zh: 我告诉过你这不是游戏 凯娅

translation.en: All four kings in the same room. How long has it been, three years?
translation.zh: 四国王齐聚一堂 多久没这样了？ 三年？

translation.en: So, who is this Parker, and how did we miss him?
translation.zh: 这位帕克是何许人？ 我们怎么会没有识破他？

translation.en: Career intelligence agent. Born in Belfast, lives alone.
translation.zh: 专职情报员 生于贝尔法斯特 独居

translation.en: He has no one he cares for. There's nothing much to live for.
translation.zh: 他无亲无故 无牵无挂 他…

translation.en: He has devoted his life to a country that sees him as expendable.
translation.zh: 精忠报国 却被国家视如草芥

translation.en: Okay. We get it. All that is fuel for the fire.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们明白 这一切都是火上浇油

translation.en: -But it won't burn without a spark. -[woman] I was getting to that.
translation.zh: 但没有火星子也烧不起来 我刚刚正要说这点

translation.en: I had to lean extremely hard on some very old friends for this.
translation.zh: 我迫不得已 对一些老朋友施压 才拿到这个

translation.en: It was before your time. Before the Heart, for that matter.
translation.zh: 是你加入之前的事甚至在谍心问世之前

translation.en: A Chechen warlord was given free rein by the Chechen and Russian governments.
translation.zh: 车臣和俄罗斯政府任由一位车臣军阀为所欲为

translation.en: The West, as always, were looking the other way.
translation.zh: 西方国家一如既往 视而不见

translation.en: He was wiping out whole villages, trying to stamp out dissent.
translation.zh: 他扫荡了无数村庄 消除异己

translation.en: But… what's this got to do with Parker?

translation.zh: 用的是另一个身份 没有电子记录

translation.en: But he was there, with MI6,
translation.zh: 但他当时在场 跟军情六处一起

translation.en: delivering weapons to take the warlord out.
translation.zh: 运送武器 以消灭那个军阀

translation.en: [King] Intelligence came through from MI6 that their entire team had been executed.
translation.zh: 从军情六处传来情报 说他们整支队伍都被处决了

translation.en: We thought there was no one left to save.
The region was a tinderbox on the verge of full civil war.
translation.zh: 那个地区情势危急 随时可能爆发全面内战

translation.en: We couldn't let those weapons fall into the warlord's hands.
translation.zh: 我们不能让那些武器落入军阀之手

translation.en: It would have cost thousands of lives.
translation.zh: 不计其数的人会因此丧命

translation.en: We had a drone that was stationed overhead armed with missiles.
translation.zh: 我们在空中 有一架携带导弹的无人机

translation.en: We made it look like a rebel force had ordered the drone strike.
translation.zh: 我们让人误以为这起无人机袭击是叛军发动的
军情六处将自己的过失雪藏起来
没有报告 没有调查

translation.en: No record of the personnel who had been involved.

translation.zh: 我们以为所有人都死了

translation.en: So, you think… he knows it was us?
translation.zh: 这么说 你认为 他知道当初是我们干的？

translation.en: I think that's a safe assumption.
And now he wants to destroy the Charter.
You stick to the tech and leave strategy to me, okay?
translation.zh: 你只管技术 战略的事交给我 好吗？

translation.en: Let me remind you, we're partners. Okay? So if you want me to do my job,
translation.zh: 提醒你一下 我们是搭档 好吗？ 如果你希望我好好做事

translation.en: you have to tell me what you're doing before you do it.
translation.zh: 就得在动手之前 提前通知我

translation.en: Let me remind you, the Charter don't give two shits
translation.zh: 我提醒你一下 特许局根本不在乎贝利和小杨这种人

translation.en: about people like Bailey and Yang.
translation.zh: 特许局根本不在乎贝利和小杨这种人

translation.en: So, if you want us to succeed, you shouldn't either.
translation.zh: 你若希望我们成功 也不该在乎

translation.en: I'm a friend of your dad's.
She hacked into the camera feed.
Let's see how well she covered her tracks.
translation.zh: 来看看她的隐身技术有多高明
凯娅 你去沙漠干什么？

translation.en: I'm guessing it's not the nightlife.
translation.zh: 那里可没什么夜生活可言

translation.en: [Parker] You ever done this before? Choppered in at over 40,000 feet?
translation.zh: 你以前做过这种事吗？ 在12千米的高空开直升机？
你诓我呢 没人干过那种事

translation.en: But my mama always said I could do anything.
translation.zh: 但我妈妈总是说 我无所不能

translation.en: How long do we have before the Locker descends?
translation.zh: 谍柜还要多久才会降落？

translation.en: At which point, the Charter will realize what's going on.
translation.zh: 到那时 特许局就会恍然大悟

translation.en: It'll take nine minutes and 26 seconds for the Locker to drop to 40,000 feet.
translation.zh: 谍柜降落至12千米的高空需要9分26秒

translation.en: We'll have about eight minutes to get in, take the Heart,
translation.zh: 我们有约八分钟的时间可以进去 夺走谍心

translation.en: and get out again before they regain control.
translation.zh: 然后在他们重获控制之前离开

translation.en: No. I'll be sure when it descends.
translation.zh: 不确定 谍柜降落时我才能确定

translation.en: If they found my code, it won't descend, they'll be waiting for us, and we all die.
translation.zh: 我的代码若被发现 谍柜就不会降落 我们会落入他们的网中 然后死翘翘

translation.en: Uh… nothing. But they need to pop their heads up at some point.
translation.zh: 没有 不过他们迟早会现身的

translation.en: Oh no, no, no, no, no.
Get Nomad now! Get Nomad now!
Just get me up there. I'll do the rest.
translation.zh: 送我上去 剩下的事交给我

translation.en: Nomad will string me up for this.
Tell her I stole your keys.
translation.zh: 告诉她是我偷了你的钥匙

translation.en: You'll just have to trust me.
How will we know if it's worked?
translation.zh: 我们如何知道是否成功了？

translation.en: The Locker has been dropped 15,000 feet in the last two minutes.
translation.zh: 在过去两分钟内谍柜下降了将近4.6千米

translation.en: Security systems are all down. I'm locked out.
translation.zh: 安全系统都已失效 我被锁在外面了

translation.en: -How is that even possible? Another hack? -No. No.
translation.zh: 怎么可能？我们又被入侵了？ 不 他们第一次入侵就是为了这个目的

translation.en: This is why they did it the first time.
translation.zh: 不 他们第一次入侵就是为了这个目的

translation.en: It's been lying dormant in our system until now.
translation.zh: 它一直潜伏在我们的系统内直到现在

translation.en: Contact every Charter agent in the region.
translation.zh: 联络这一带所有特许局探员

translation.en: [pilot] Approaching coordinates in five, four, three--
translation.zh: 正在接近坐标 五、四、三…

translation.en: -I hope you know what you're doing. -[Stone] Tell me about it.
translation.zh: -真希望你知道自己在做什么-我也希望

translation.en: -We have a something approaching fast. -[Nomad] A something?
translation.zh: 有东西在快速靠近我们 东西？

translation.en: I think-- I think it's a someone.
I have to descend. Lower the rotor speed.
translation.zh: 我得降低高度 降低旋翼转速

translation.en: [Parker] Copy that. See you in seven minutes.
The ship's lining is filled with hydrogen. One spark, and we're all dead.
translation.zh: 飞船上充满了氢气一个火星子 我们就死定了

translation.en: No way to get hold of her.
I told you not to get out of the van.
You also told me to have some fun.
And now you answer to me.

translation.zh: 帕克 还有90秒 走吧

translation.en: [Parker] Shame about your parachute. You'll be needing that.
translation.zh: 你的降落伞坏了 真可惜 你会需要的

translation.en: -We'll be lucky to get to base as it is. -[grunts]
translation.zh: 不可能 照这个情况我们能飞到基地就算走运了

translation.en: Give me that thing before somebody gets--
translation.zh: 把东西交给我 免得有人…

translation.en: You're gonna secret-agent our way back to civilization,
translation.zh: 你施展大探员的浑身解数带我们回到文明世界

translation.en: and I'm gonna follow three steps behind you with this gun.
translation.zh: 我拿着这把枪跟在后面距离三步之遥

translation.en: But I encrypted it to my biometrics, so it's useless without me.
translation.zh: 但我用我的生物特征给它加密了没有我 那玩意就没用

translation.en: If I shoot you now, all this is over.
translation.zh: 如果我现在对你开枪 一切就结束了

translation.en: Show you the same mercy you showed Bailey and Yang.
translation.zh: 像你对贝利和小杨那样毫不心慈手软
那样做合情合理 瑞秋

translation.en: It's what the Heart would tell you to do.
translation.zh: 谍心也会让你这样做 对吧？

translation.en: Trying to get even with Niam Kharche for kicking you out of the penthouse?
translation.zh: 想报复尼亚姆卡奇吗？ 是他把你赶出家门的

translation.en: Right. You think you know everything.
translation.zh: 对 你自以为无所不知

translation.en: I bet the Heart told you that he adopted me,
translation.zh: 谍心一定告诉过你 他收养了我

translation.en: lifted me out of nothing. But did it tell you why?
translation.zh: 让我摆脱贫困但它告诉你原因了吗？

translation.en: Kharche used my parents like lab rats in a medical trial, and it killed them.
translation.zh: 卡奇把我父母当成医学实验的小白鼠 害死了他们

translation.en: He covered everything up and took me in thinking he was doing me a favor,
translation.zh: 他掩盖整件事 收养我 自以为是帮我

translation.en: but I let him think that because I knew one day,
translation.zh: 但我让他那样认为 因为我知道总有一天 我会强大起来

translation.en: I'd be strong enough to make him pay for what he did to my parents.
translation.zh: 因为我知道总有一天 我会强大起来 让他为我父母的死付出代价

translation.en: So, you get to tear the whole world down?
translation.zh: 所以你要摧毁整个世界？

translation.en: Oh, this is not just for me.
I've got my whole naughty list, and we're going to expose them all.
translation.zh: 我拿到了恶人名单我们要让他们全部曝光

translation.en: With no thought of what comes next.
And you think the Charter's any better?
translation.zh: 你以为特许局就好很多吗？

translation.en: Just because they saved you doesn't make them good.
translation.zh: 他们救了你 这不代表他们就是好人

translation.en: You think I didn't look into you?
How many schools did you get kicked out of?
translation.zh: 你被多少所学校开除过？

translation.en: Always a rebel. Always a problem.
translation.zh: 总是叛逆不羁 总是惹麻烦
直到特许局出现 对吧？

translation.en: And gives you that discipline that you so clearly crave.
translation.zh: 给了你渴望已久的约束

translation.en: But did they take you in because you were good?
translation.zh: 但他们收留你是因为你优秀吗？
-还是因为你是个残次品？-够了
或许我曾经是个残次品

translation.en: But there's a woman I know only as Nomad.
translation.zh: 但我知道一个叫诺玛的女人

translation.en: showed me what's possible when there's someone watching your back.
translation.zh: 让我知道如果有人罩着你 可能性会无穷无尽

translation.en: Parker's coming for you, and I wanna have a bigger gun when he shows up.
translation.zh: 帕克会来找你 我得有把更大的枪来对付他

translation.en: Okay, let's just, um, give them a good cover story.
translation.zh: 好 编个故事骗他们吧

translation.en: They'll keep us alive for ransom. We reel them in, and then bam.
translation.zh: 为了赎金 他们会留我们一命 引他们上钩 然后给他们个痛快

translation.en: Just to be clear, the "bam" is for you to take them out.
translation.zh: 话说清楚“给他们个痛快”就是你把他们干掉

translation.en: [in English] You know, the Charter can take down Kharche.
translation.zh: 特许局可以把卡奇干掉

translation.en: Parker's way isn't the only way.
translation.zh: 帕克并非你唯一的出路
之前的约定不是这样的

translation.en: Killing her wasn't the deal either. You have to pay me now.
translation.zh: 我们也没说要杀她 你现在得付钱给我

translation.en: You're a hard woman to find.
Dhawan is back with Parker. I slipped her a tracker.
translation.zh: 达万跟帕克会合了 我给她偷偷装了个追踪器

translation.en: They're heading north. Looping you in now.
translation.zh: 他们正往北走我把他们的信号分享给你

translation.en: Nice to hear your voice. I was a bit worried about you.
translation.zh: 很高兴听到你的声音 我之前有点担心你

translation.en: Okay, got her. They're heading towards Iceland.
translation.zh: 好 找到她了 他们正前往冰岛

translation.en: I take it I'm no longer compromised.
translation.zh: 我现在已经没有危险了吧？

translation.en: Well, they have the Heart, so we're all compromised.
translation.zh: 谍心在他们手上所以现阶段 我们都有危险

translation.en: Parker's coming after the Charter, so we're heading to a secure location.
translation.zh: 帕克的目标是特许局我们要去一个安全地点

translation.en: We'll make sure they're on the ground by the time you arrive.
translation.zh: 我们会确保他们比你提前到达

translation.en: Just get there as fast as you can.
If they get the Heart online, God knows what they're capable of.
translation.zh: 若是他们让谍心上线 天知道他们能做出什么事

translation.en: It's not impregnable, but it's the best we've got.
translation.zh: 这里并非坚不可摧 但没有更好的地方了

translation.en: If the Heart wants to find us, it will.
translation.zh: 如果谍心想找到我们 它会成功

translation.en: [Stone] Will this hunk of junk make it to Iceland?
translation.zh: 这破烂玩意能飞到冰岛吗？

translation.en: Nice trick you pulled with the facial recognition yesterday.
translation.zh: 你昨天给谍心加了人脸识别 真不错

translation.en: Trying to put a lock on our new toy.
translation.zh: 给我们的新玩具加上一道锁

translation.en: Would you come back for me if I hadn't?
translation.zh: 要是我不那样做 你会回来救我吗？

translation.en: I know where they're going. Reykjavik University computer lab.
translation.zh: 我知道他们要去哪里 雷克雅未克大学计算机实验室

translation.en: It has a cryo-storage facility, several floors of servers.
translation.zh: 那里有个低温储存设施 好几层楼的服务器

translation.en: The tracker's heading straight for it.
translation.zh: 追踪器正朝着那个方向过去

translation.en: See, Keya, don't say I don't keep my promises.
translation.zh: 看吧 凯娅 别说我不守信用

translation.en: Okay, be ready. You know your instructions.
translation.zh: 好了 做好准备 各位都清楚指示

translation.en: Couple of minutes, we'll be up and running.
translation.zh: 几分钟后 就可以上线运行

translation.en: Emails, texts, bank accounts. The Heart's using my algorithm to sort through it all.
translation.zh: 电邮、短信、银行账户 谍心利用我的算法筛查了一切信息

translation.en: So, we can find anyone? Gain access to anything?
translation.zh: 所以我们能找到任何人？访问任何东西？

translation.en: Greatest skeleton key in the world.
translation.zh: 全世界最棒的万能密钥

translation.en: Evidence of Kharche's years of experiments on innocents across the country.
translation.zh: 多年来 卡奇在全国各地的无辜人士身上做实验 这是证据

translation.en: That's the truth… for the world to see.
translation.zh: 这是世人都该有目共睹的真相

translation.en: That's impressive. But let's see what else this thing can do.
translation.zh: 真厉害 不过看看这玩意还能做什么

translation.en: [woman] Nancy Morrison. King of Diamonds. Ex-CIA.
translation.zh: 南茜莫里森 方块国王 前中情局探员

translation.en: The Heart tells us she's heading to a safe house with her family.
translation.zh: 谍心显示 她正带着家人前往安全屋

translation.en: [man] Hang on. I have another one.
translation.zh: 等等 我还有个发现

translation.en: I think you're gonna like this, boss.
An unidentified military plane landed at a private airfield 33 minutes ago.
translation.zh: 一架身份不明的军用飞机 33分钟前在一个私人机场降落

translation.en: Jiang Hsu. Served 35 years in Chinese State Security Service.
translation.zh: 徐江 在中国国安部工作了35年

translation.en: The King of Clubs is here in Iceland.
Even better. Where is he now?
translation.zh: 那更好 他现在在哪里？

translation.en: Sending the plans now. Stone is on her way.
translation.zh: 正在发送计划 斯通在路上了

translation.en: We don't have time to wait. Tell her to follow us in.
translation.zh: 我们没时间等了 告诉她跟着我们就行

translation.en: Any news of Spades or Hearts?
translation.zh: 有黑桃队和红心队的消息吗？

translation.en: There were other people in that elevator. In that lobby.
translation.zh: 那架电梯和那个大厅里还有其他人

translation.en: You said we were going to expose Kharche and then the Charter, not murder them.
translation.zh: 你说我们要让卡奇曝光 然后是特许局 而不是杀了他们

translation.en: The King of Hearts with her team. They're in a bunker outside of London.
translation.zh: 红心国王跟她的团队在一起 他们在伦敦郊外的地堡里

translation.en: -We'll see you on the other side. -You're going in with them?
translation.zh: -后会有期-你要跟他们一起进去？

translation.en: I ordered the strike on Parker. It's only fair.
translation.zh: 是我下令袭击帕克的 这样才公平

translation.en: You know… I would have made the same call in Chechnya.
translation.zh: 你知道 如果当年我在车臣 也会那样做

translation.en: [Jack] Oh God. They've shut off our ventilation system.
translation.zh: 老天 他们把我们的通风系统关掉了
杰克 我们还有多少时间？

translation.en: At this rate, about an hour and we're out of oxygen.
translation.zh: 照这个速度 大概一小时后 氧气就会耗尽

translation.en: The Charter never worries about who gets in their way. Neither will we.
translation.zh: 特许局总是毫不犹豫清除绊脚石 我们也不会多想

translation.en: [woman] King of Hearts is locked in. They'll be dead in an hour.
translation.zh: 红心国王被锁起来了一小时后 他们就会没命

translation.en: -You have to stop this, please. -Someone has to control this power, Keya.
translation.zh: 你不能继续这样 拜托 这种权力必须有人来掌控 凯娅

translation.en: -Why not us? -This is not what we agreed.
translation.zh: -我们就担此重任吧-之前不是这样说的

translation.en: You're still not seeing the bigger picture.
This isn't about some pissy little grievance you had
translation.zh: 你对杀害双亲的仇人不满

translation.en: with the bad man who killed your mom and dad.
Concentrated in the hands of the few, of the very few who could use it for good,
translation.zh: 权力集中在少数人手中 少数能用权力来做好事的人

translation.en: who could actually make a change, but they don't.
translation.zh: 他们可以做出改变 但他们不那样做

translation.en: At this moment, we are mining trillions of pieces of data.
translation.zh: 此刻 我们正在挖掘数万亿条数据

translation.en: In a matter of hours, I will be able to take down
translation.zh: 再过几小时 我就能干掉特许局剩余的成员

translation.en: the remaining members of the Charter.
translation.zh: 我就能干掉特许局剩余的成员

translation.en: We've been used and manipulated our whole lives.
translation.zh: 我们这辈子一直任人利用和摆布

translation.en: Now it's time for us to take control.
translation.zh: 现在该由我们来控制一切了

translation.en: [man] Clubs team are inside the university building.
translation.zh: 梅花队已进入校区大楼了

translation.en: You wanna know how great men get power, Keya?
translation.zh: 凯娅 想知道伟人如何获得权力吗？

translation.en: It's not because they earn it…
It is because when the moment comes,

translation.zh: 就位 我们都准备好了

translation.en: Stone, you need to get out now.
translation.zh: 斯通 你得马上离开

translation.en: I have a failsafe uploading. It will disable the Heart.
translation.zh: 我在上传故障保险 它会让谍心失效

translation.en: They won't be able to access it without me.
translation.zh: 没有我 他们就不能访问它

translation.en: I'm outside. But you already know that.
translation.zh: 我在外面 但你已经知道了

translation.en: No, you're not. It's a trap.
translation.zh: 不 不行 这是陷阱

translation.en: The lab is a decoy. You need to get your team out now.
translation.zh: 那个实验室是个诱饵 你得让你的队友马上离开

translation.en: -Why should I believe you? -Because you were right.
translation.zh: -我凭什么相信你？-因为你说得对

translation.en: Okay? You told me about Parker, and you were right about everything.
translation.zh: 好吧 你告诉我帕克的事 都被你说中了 瑞秋

translation.en: My parents would have never wanted this.
translation.zh: 我的父母绝不希望我这样

translation.en: Get your team out of there right now.
I'm sending you my coordinates. I'll leave the back door open.
translation.zh: 我把我的坐标发给你我会让后门开着

translation.en: [grunts] I'm Nine of Hearts. I need your radio.
translation.zh: 我是红心九 我需要你的对讲机

translation.en: This is Nine of Hearts. Get out of there. It's a trap.
translation.zh: 我是红心九 快出来 是陷阱

translation.en: Do you hear me? She found the tracker. Get out of there.
translation.zh: 你们听到了吗？她发现追踪器了 快出来
嗯 我听到你的话了

translation.en: I-- Could be minutes. Could be hours.
translation.zh: 我…可能几分钟 可能几小时

translation.en: You have until I get back.
[Ivo] There must be an emergency override system.
translation.zh: 肯定是有应急覆盖系统
我们一定是遗漏了什么

translation.en: Jack, is there any way we can get hold of Stone?
translation.zh: 杰克 我们有办法联系上斯通吗？

translation.en: No. No comms. We're still offline.
translation.zh: 不 没有通讯 我们仍处于离线状态

translation.en: -[Nomad] Stone, thank God. Where are you? -Clubs are dead.
translation.zh: 斯通 谢天谢地 你在哪里？ 梅花队的人死了

translation.en: [Stone] Keya. She shut down the Heart.
translation.zh: 凯娅 她把谍心关闭了

translation.en: -How do you know she's not playing you? -I don't.
translation.zh: 你如何知道她没耍你？ 我不知道

translation.en: [Nomad] We're gonna die in less than an hour.
translation.zh: 不到一小时 我们就会死
-他们关闭了我们的通风系统-什么？

translation.en: -She shut down our air supply. -[Stone] Parker did.
translation.zh: 她关闭了我们的通风系统 是帕克干的

translation.en: I'd be dead too if I hadn't listened to her.
translation.zh: 要不是听了她的话 我也没命了

translation.en: I trust her, and you need to trust me.
translation.zh: 我相信她 你得相信我
抱歉 我要借用你的卡车

translation.en: [Parker] I know you're in here, Keya.
translation.zh: 我知道你在里面 凯娅

translation.en: You know, you still have a choice.
You can still be a part of this.

translation.zh: 事情无可避免 你只是在拖延而已

translation.en: -Would you like me to wait? -[Stone] Definitely no.

translation.zh: 好 我们从哪里开始？

translation.en: No, we'll be needing those. Knees?
translation.zh: 不行 手指还有用 膝盖？

translation.en: I need to get back in there.
The Heart has to be disconnected and reconnected again to the servers.
translation.zh: 必须把谍心断开连接然后再重新连接到服务器上

translation.en: Any interference, the system automatically shuts down. You know that.
translation.zh: 有任何干扰 系统就会自动关闭 你知道的

translation.en: This doesn't end well for you, Stone. Take another step, and she's dead.
translation.zh: 你不会有好下场的 斯通 你往前一步 她就死定了

translation.en: -I don't care. I'm here for you. -[Parker] Bullshit.
translation.zh: 我不在乎 我的目标是你 胡扯

translation.en: You and I know that without this one,
translation.zh: 你我都清楚 没有她

translation.en: the Heart stays down and everyone inside that bunker dies,
translation.zh: 谍心就无法重新上线 地堡里的所有人都会死

translation.en: unless, of course, they're dead already.
translation.zh: 当然 除非他们已经死了

translation.en: I have the Heart, and I have the Kings. That's a winning hand.
translation.zh: 谍心在我手上 几位国王也在我手上 我赢定了

translation.en: Good girl. Now, kick it away.
And why do you have to kill them to make it?
translation.zh: 你为何非要杀死他们不可？

translation.en: I've served my entire life, Rachel, and none of it mattered.
translation.zh: 瑞秋 我为国效命一辈子结果一切皆枉然

translation.en: The world is still in chaos.
The Heart has the power to change everything.
But the Charter are using it to keep things exactly as they are.
translation.zh: 但特许局却用它来保持现状

translation.en: You don't wanna change anything. You just wanna be the one in charge.
translation.zh: 你并不想改变任何东西 只是想当老大而已

translation.en: First thing you did with all that power was kill people.
[scoffs] The problem with men like you, Parker,
translation.zh: 帕克 你这种人有个问题

translation.en: is that your power is only ever based on threats and violence.
translation.zh: 那就是你们的权力永远只建立在威胁和暴力之上

translation.en: And when you brutalize everyone around you, even your own team…
translation.zh: 当你残忍对待身边所有人 连自己的队友都不放过时

translation.en: you'll never have the one thing I know I always will.
translation.zh: 你绝不会拥有一样东西而我知道我会永远拥有它

translation.en: See you when I get there. [exhales]

translation.zh: 诺玛 告诉我你没事

translation.en: It's good to hear from you, Stone.
translation.zh: 很高兴听到你的声音 斯通

translation.en: [girl] But what is it? Who's it from?
translation.zh: 不过这是什么？谁送来的？

translation.en: I decided to embrace the cliché and use my time in jail to get ripped.
translation.zh: 我决定接受老套的安排 利用坐牢的时间来好好健身
比你之前的目标强多了

translation.en: And you? Back with the Charter?
[inhales] Yeah, I'm back with the Charter.
If we only follow the odds, we'll never do anything in spite of the odds.
translation.zh: 如果我们只看几率行事 不管几率如何 都成不了大事

translation.en: And what if the odds tell you to do nothing?
translation.zh: 如果几率建议按兵不动那该怎么办？
我喜欢我的队友 凯娅

translation.en: I wanna surround myself with people who will change the world for good.
translation.zh: 我希望跟心怀天下的人共事
有好消息 也有坏消息

translation.en: The good news, I've scouted the square, and your plan just might work.
translation.zh: 好消息 我勘察了广场 你的计划可能会奏效

translation.en: [exhales] Uh, they were out of oat milk.
What? You told me to blend in.
translation.zh: 怎么？是你让我混入其中的

translation.en: Did we get into the power grid?
Yeah. It wasn't that hard, because their password was "password."
translation.zh: 是的 超容易的 因为他们的密码就是“密码”

translation.en: Um, you know we can still throw you in jail, right?
translation.zh: 我们仍然可以送你去吃牢饭你知道的吧？

translation.en: We stay in the van, boss.
translation.zh: 我们会老实待着 老大

translation.en: -The Heart's all set. -[Stone] And the diversion?
translation.zh: 谍心已准备就绪 调虎离山计呢？
